website_summaries.verdict: Just like the popular adult version, but in smaller sizes to fit smaller feet.
pros: Easy for kids to put on themselves
Comes in a lot of colors and sizes to fit your child's foot
Easy to pull on and off in the summer time when your kids prefer bare feet, but need shoes to go certain places
cons: Crocs do not stay on the feet as well as some other shoes
Some kids have a hard time walking in them

customer_reviews.title: good crocs
customer_reviews.text: Crocs Infants / Toddlers Kids Classic is a nice pair of crocs. The bright blue and very light, almost yellow green is a fun mix. Little boys like the fun looking colors and enjoy wearing these crocs. Crocs is generally a very good company, and these didn't disappoint me. They lasted a few years of being constantly worn before the back part of one broke off. This is a nice pair of water shoes for little / toddler boys. They are very durable and comfortable and will hold up to active boys who wear them tons. These are also waterproof, so they can be worn for any water activities, as well as the pool or beach.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Just don't make 'em like they used to
customer_reviews.text: We've owned a lot of Crocs over the years for our four children. Some even lasted through a few of our kids and some cousins in between :) That's why I was disappointed and somewhat baffled when these fell apart two months in. They were only worn a few times during those few months, but one day the button fell off (the one with the logo on it that holds the strap on). I was able to reattach it, but it was never the same and would fall off at will after that. We had to put these guys in early retirement.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet; kids love Crocs!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these. My daughter has wide feet, and Crocs have always fit well for her. She loves them most, I think, because she can put them on herself. My only beef with these (and ALL Crocs) is that they let in dirt, water and whatever else you walk in. And kids are definitely going to walk through the puddle, and not around. So we don't let her walk in the yard with them or on rainy days. Otherwise these are great, and hold up so well. Since they span 2 sizes, they last longer than her other shoes. And they're still in great condition to be passed down to the next sibling.
customer_reviews.author: Anelley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes for my son
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes for my son; he's been wearing Crocs for several years now. What we like most about them is that they're super easy and fast to get on and off... and they keep his feet cool in the summer. I'll try generic shoes like this every now and again but always come back to Crocs because they last longer -- both the tread and the strap on the heel. Size-wise, these fit exactly as expected... They're exactly the same as what he wears in sneakers, bowling shoes and roller skates.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Watson

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my grandson 1st birthday last July 2014. He is still able to wear them (04/2015) - only without the strap on the back now. Let me just say how much he LOVES these crocs. I have a number of crocs and if he sees me wearing mine he has to run to find his to put on. They are great shoes because they are easy to get on, easy to clean, great for summer weather (without socks).
customer_reviews.author: Kahelilani

customer_reviews.title: essential
customer_reviews.text: My 14mo wears a size 4 in most shoes, I ordered these in the 4/5 and they fit great with some room to grow. They do fall off easily when I'm carrying her, though. I ordered the citrus/ocean and love the bright color combo. Crocs are such an essential shoe to have for kids, so great for in the yard, waterplay, swimming pool, beach, river, camping, etc. I would definitely go with the actual crocs brand and not buy the knock-offs, the quality is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected, but better
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something that our young boys could use all summer, to play in the water and outside without worry of ruining them. We thought of Crocs, but I remembered them as hard material that the boys wouldn't like. I decided to try them anyway, because I couldn't find anything else that fit the bill.....and I was delightfully surprised to find that the material is softer now, so it doesn't rub on their feet like I remembered. They love them, and therefore so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Necessity shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got these in size 5 W for my 9 year old. Khaki seems like a good color for those who are branching out from princess colors and rainbows. Crocks are good tromping shoes for anywhere. They're the only shoes that make sense in and around lakes. They float to the top if one slides off. They can get sucked into lake mud. Some poking around with a paddle and it will float back up. Good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Fox

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Crocs' successive sizes are notably wide apart. So your kid's feet will have plenty of growth space in the next size up. This is the only fault I find (even though the back strap is short to compensate, and stretchable to facilitate the gradual foot growth). Otherwise my boys find them most comfortable and it is their go-to summer footwear. And after 4 years and several purchases I find then to be very long-wearing.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Good Crocs as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy the original style Crocs for my daughter every year for the summer. I like them because they are a bit wider and comes in double sizes (e.g., 9-10, 10-11, etc.), so it accommodates growing feet. The lime green is really bright and the shot of pink strap is really cute. Plus, I got these for $12, so you really can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: CharmedShopper

customer_reviews.title: So easy....
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE crocs for my 3 year old. So easy for off and on and he can put them on himself. So handy and they can take a beating. We will always have a pair of crocs around for going to the pool, to the river, even just slipping them on to go outside. So easy. Plus if they get dirty at all, so quick to rinse and get them clean again.
customer_reviews.author: ktmb

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Pink!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7 year old not knowing if they would fit due to how Crocs sizes their shoes versus how shoe sizes are listed on Amazon. She wears a kids size 2. I ordered the M2/W4 and it was the correct size. Crocs lists that size as a C2/W4 just to clarify. My daughter loves them in pink lemonade and wears them to the water park all the time. Definitely worth the money and I know they can be passed down to my other daughter eventually.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brow

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 year old son. He loves them. They fit perfectly, and he is able to take them off and put them on all on his own. This is a big deal to me, but an even bigger deal to my son. The price was $10 less than the Croc site. They came in a Croc bag, on a Croc shoe hanger, well packaged. The value meets the cost of the product. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat crocs. My youngest kids love them because they are easy to put on and comfortable to wear. I used the size chart and measured my daughter's foot because the size had worn off of her old pair, and these fit spot on. I know they will last as long as they fit. Perfect. They are definitely red, but when she wears hot pink they blend in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: 3girlzn3boyz

customer_reviews.title: good shoes, wierd sizing
customer_reviews.text: I had tried these on in a store but bough on amazon due to price. Though both pairs were size 8/9, these were too small. I subsequentially bought a 10/11 pair and they seem too big. I think there is a difference betwen the "toddler" and "little kid" sizing. I wish it was more clear.. we kept the 10/11s knowing he'll grow but it still a little frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: new mom

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Crocs for both my boys at the beach, running through the sprinklers at the playground, and generally just playing in summer. However, why are they so darn WIDE! It works for one of my kids who has feet on the wide side. But my other child has very narrow feet and the Crocs almost fly off when he walks let alone run. Please Crocs, make a narrow version of your classics!
customer_reviews.author: nisabisa

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6, and he loves his Crocs. They're perfect slip on and off shoes. As crocs usually run a little larger & wider than most shoes, there is no need to order a size up. If they're a little big, it's ok-they'll last a little longer. I've never had a pair tear up-even after leaving outside and everything. All kids need a pair.
customer_reviews.author: puglover98

customer_reviews.title: happy chappie
customer_reviews.text: since my son started wearing shoes Crocs have been the brand for us. it is thanks to crocs that i got him to even wear shoes! the color is vibrant and yes red is his favorite color. they fit perfectly and give him a better sense of independence (which it seems is very important for a kindergardener)as he can get them on and off on his own. now he needs to learn to tie his shoes! thanks crocs!
customer_reviews.author: sherry stevens

customer_reviews.title: 8 yr Grandson loves Kids Crocs
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, fun, grandson loves these shoes. Hard to get him to take them off and put on other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W. Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: had to return it due to size issue but want to give 5 stars for the returning service
customer_reviews.text: I want to say that this product has cute design and good taste color match but runs somehow small comparing with other 4-5 Crocs shoes I bought in stores. I ended up returning the 4-5 size one that my son normally wears and re-ordered a bigger size. Thanks for the convenient returning service, 5 starts for the returning service. Great job Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: KBMOM

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect shoe to have for toddlers in the summer. They are super easy to slip on and off a squirmy toddler and I don't have to worry about her playing in the sand, mud, dirt or water in them. We can rinse them right off and her foot isn't stuck in a wet shoe all day. With the dual sizes (i.e. 4/5) they last a long time before having to move into a bigger size!
customer_reviews.author: YankeeInNC

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are a good fit for daily use at home or at the park, beach, swiming pool, etc
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a good fit for outdoor activities and daily use at home, indoors/ outdoors or at the park, beach, swimming pool, etc. The material is comfortable and flexible. The shoe is designed to permit good air circulation and adequate protection. The strap is a little larger than it needed to be, but it's acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: eTech4Hire

customer_reviews.title: My sons gardening shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 4 is very picky about shoes. The way they feel or flop on his feet. He will not wear flip flops or the Velcro type of sandals and he loves these! Now we don't have to wear socks and shoes all of the time! I find they fit him true to his usual shoe size. Fun colors to choose from too. Mine wanted them brown like the dirt. Go figure :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great for that
customer_reviews.text: My kids are very active and play quite a bit outdoors. These are great for that. Muddy. No problem. Just rinse and dry. We love them. They do slip off sometimes, but so would sandals. I suppose a velcro option would be good, but that piece would stay a little wet after it was rinsed..
customer_reviews.author: W Teeheg

customer_reviews.title: Best summer shoes for Summer!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his crocs. I just hate when he loses track of them because it is an ordeal to find them when we are trying to leave the house. He goes EVERYWHERE with them. They are breathable, durable, easy to clean and come in every color he would want. ONLY drawback...jibbitz. They are TOUGH to remove from an old pair and hard to 'snap' in a new pair. But them that is because they can't shake loose or fall out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year old is very sensitive to shoes and clothing. She hates sleeves and socks, etc. If you have a kid like this, then you know what I mean. But she loves her Crocs! As soon as she outgrows a pair, I order a new pair. Plus, they're waterproof, sand-proof, kid-proof, washable, super easy to slip on and off and cute too. Gotta love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: CrystallBlue

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my daughter for water play. ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter for water play. Her foot measures a 10, and she is wearing a 10.5 sneaker. So I purchased these in the 10-11 size, and they're a bit big for her. I'm worried that the 9-10 would have been too small. I wish summer shoes came with more accurate measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Bongabot

customer_reviews.title: Love the slip-on clog
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kid when we are on the run. He's had at least one pair of crocs every year since he could walk and he's almost 6 . Indestructible. This color won't go with everything of course, but they're fun. And of ocurse, the "technology" means they won't stink up their cute little feet.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves the color!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has always been a croc fan, and when she saw another little girl wearing this color she had to have them! Crocs are an odd fit size wise, but I took her to the store and had her try a size on in another color and then ordered online. Amazon had them even cheaper than the Crocs website and I got free shipping. Crocs take a beating and still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Kids and adults love these
customer_reviews.text: These crocs/clogs were a great price. They are perfect for going to the pool, playing in the yard, and the sandbox. The kids love being able to put them on and take them off by themselves-I love that too. I love that they are so easy to clean. They tend to be roomy in size.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Toddler is able to get on and off easily
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler really likes his blue sandals. They are easy to get on and off and great for the summer months to kick around in the back yard or when going to the spray park. Fit well. They cover two sizes, so when they are just growing into a size 10, these were a little big, but fit for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleSummers

customer_reviews.title: my son loves to wear these to walk to and from swim class
customer_reviews.text: my son loves to wear these to walk to and from swim class and walking around the neighborhood. it's easy for him to put on and he prefers them over sandals.
customer_reviews.author: C. A Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Crocs
customer_reviews.text: I like crocs, except the prices.... These were reasonable ... But they are a bit big.. In the description they are referred to as "8" ...yet on the crocs themselves they say "8-9".... No "biggy", cause a bit big is always better...by mid summer should be perfect ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. George F. Marquise Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Will Stretch
customer_reviews.text: These run a little small, but my granddaughter LOVES them.... they DID stretch out!
customer_reviews.author: Lesia Smalls

customer_reviews.title: bad vendor
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Crocs for my kids for the last 4 years - always from the Crocs website. They didn't have the color my daughter wanted, so I bought some here from Amazon instead. BIG MISTAKE! THE BACK STRAP IS TOO SMALL! The other 2 pairs we own have a back strap even with the back of the shoe. The strap in these new Crocs are shorter, so they push my daughter's foot too far forward. She won't wear these!
customer_reviews.author: DGMom

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoe for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase a generic pair of these for my son, but when I realized I could buy actual Crocs for the same price here on Amazon, I bought these instead. Every summer I buy a couple of pairs of sandals for my kid, but within a few weeks they become very dirty and odorous, even with regular cleaning. That problem does not occur with the Crocs. These will be my son's new summer shoes very year from now on.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Way way way big.
customer_reviews.text: I love these crocs, but when my 17 month old outgrew the 4/5, I just bought the next size, think they might be a bit big, but wearable. Not even close. They are huge. The gap between the size 4/5 and the 6/7 is bizarrely extreme. I just hope he will not have outgrown them by next year. And these weren't cheap!
customer_reviews.author: LustmordLady

customer_reviews.title: Yaaayyyyy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son asked for these by name. Even told me what color to get! He outgrew a pair that he wore until he busted out the toes, and then cried when I told him we would have to trash them! These crocs are durable and sooooo comfy. He won't wear anything else...to school, to church, to playdates, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen's Crew

customer_reviews.title: Fits too snugly on the sides
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is made pretty well but it seems a little narrow. My baby's feet got skin impressions from inside black plugs in each shoe. Maybe his feet are really wide but the length was just fine. Socks may help too... Overall, well-made just a bit on the narrow side.
customer_reviews.author: Over-researching  Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It's a great shoe that kids can put on themselves
customer_reviews.text: It's a great shoe that kids can put on themselves. However, note that size 10/11 is not an in-between size, but is exactly the same size as 11. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: janey

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: my little one LOVES crocs and so do I. they fit great, have adorable styles and colors, are easy on/off, and can be easily cleaned with a damp cloth, the washer, or the dishwasher. these are super and a must-have for tots on the go!
customer_reviews.author: ChzSammitch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfortable, easy to clean, will last a long time. Great customer service from Crocs in case you ever need to return or replace anything. My son has 4 different colors of crocs and that is all he will wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sperry

customer_reviews.title: We are using them as yard shoes and he's fine running in them
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson likes these clogs a lot. They are flexible and he can slip them on and off himself. We are using them as yard shoes and he's fine running in them. His foot measures 6 1/2 inches and these fit him about the same as most Crocs - plenty roomy but they stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but way too big
customer_reviews.text: These crocs were fine, but would have taken my 6 1/2 year old another year or two to grow into, I even called crocs co to ask about sizing info, my son normally wears a 2 1/2 shoe size, with amazons great return policy not a problem, returned these and got a size 1, they fit ok even still enough room for another year of foot growth:)
customer_reviews.author: Ladyt303

customer_reviews.title: Run VERY big
customer_reviews.text: Crocs are so nice for wearing all summer! They are so easy to clean. Only down side is how big they are. For a toddler that doesn't pay attention to their shoes it's hard to keep them on their feet (think grocery cart and dangling legs). All in all great product though.
customer_reviews.author: krpalmer99

customer_reviews.title: great summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: these shoes fits a little large, but maybe because it give the extra width compared to regularly sandals. Very pretty colors--the shoes are the yellowish green like how the marker pens look. It looks better than many other boy-colored crocs. of course, comfy, too. My little one loves them!
customer_reviews.author: CDHH&KK

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: We are huge Crocs fan so we already know they tend to fit large. Nothing the dryer can't fix! These are great, my kids LOVE them, they are easy to clean, they can handle water, grass, mud...ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Lush M.

customer_reviews.title: Good summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great for water play or going outside for a short while. You can move the strap to the front or the back which allows for a better hold on a toddler's feet. Easy to slip on or off. Cute as well. More pricey than many sandals I'd seen, but probably worth it given the support from the back strap and durability.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but then...
customer_reviews.text: I love that my 2 1/2 year old can easily put these shoes on herself quickly and easily. They are great for the summer heat, stomping in puddles AND they are adorable on. BUT she has recently (after about 2 months wear) been falling down in them (mainly when running but sometimes when walking too). Maybe they have gotten stretched out because of the material...? :(
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G. Ferree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the SPD kid!
customer_reviews.text: My son hates wearing shoes and socks and will tear them off as often as possible. We've found that Crocs are the perfect shoe for him! I took him to a Crocs store in the mall and he picked out these shoes but I purchased them online because they were almost half the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great for Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: When my 8 year old son outgrew his old Crocs, he wanted another pair just like them. He has wide feet, so the classic Cayman style is perfect for his feet. Never too tight. He loves having shoes that he's allowed to get wet when he's playing with the watering can.
customer_reviews.author: J. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Love crocks in general for my toddler. Its not the greatest looking shoes but it is so comfortable on there feet. Because it said "classic clog" I wasn't sure if the shoe will be narrow. My daughter wears wide and she was comfortable in it and has a little room to grow into as well. color was awesome and it was an awesome price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chon

customer_reviews.title: Crocs save the day
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his crocs. He is 2 1/2 years old and hadn't wanted to wear shoes. It was a battle every time he had to wear them. He likes wearing the Crocs so much that he puts them on himself with no coaxing.
customer_reviews.author: My Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Sizing?
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very cute; however, the sizing was a little misleading. My Nephew wears a size 9 and I decided to purchase the 10-11 combo to allow extra growth for his feet, when he tried the show on, the show was almost two small. The shoe fit like a size 9 or smaller. I decided to keep because crocks are nice for toddlers to run around in and they are cute on his feet. Sizing is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Son. He seems to be in between the shoe sizes, therefore I always have to buy a size up. He grows into them nicely and they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected! Great product, my son thinks they are comfortable, they are durable and we will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Emily M. K. Rustman

customer_reviews.title: She's got tiny feet. Size 6W (normal for her) ...
customer_reviews.text: She's got tiny feet. Size 6W (normal for her) was too big, but size 5W fit well. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: I got crocs for my son over a year ago. A little more than I wanted to spend, but they have proven themselves worth the cost. I originally got a knock off pair. Those kept rubbing against his feet and giving him blisters. The same thing happened with my daughter. These shoes have never caused a problem. he wears them everywhere, beach, park, wherever. it doesn't matter if they get wet. They come in a dual size so at first were a little big, but the straps kept them on his feet, and he could grow into them. I just bought my daughter her first pair, and another pair to grow into. Love them, love them, love them.
customer_reviews.author: noah, go to

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little kids shoe for everything!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son who is 2.5 years old. He loves them and wants to wear them every day. They fit perfectly and are great for helping me pick veggies in the garden. He thought they were the best shoes ever.
customer_reviews.author: EJMerlin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These Crocs are made of a really soft plastic that provides excellent comfort and air flow. I will say that they are cheaply made but hear that the quality has gone down since they are made in Mexico (ours) and not China anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: You either love them or you hate them, and we love them. Order a new pair for the kids every season because it is their sandal of choice and they wear them everywhere. These original crocs are still the best for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Red Pepper

customer_reviews.title: great for water play
customer_reviews.text: Too large so I used it later.. great for water play
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: croc kids clogs

customer_reviews.author: Shana Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Size was way too small
customer_reviews.text: These run very small. My boys are a size 4 shoe and I bought M2/W4 and they were waaaay too small for my kids. Quality was great and they are real crocs but had to return bcs size was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the Color
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for childcare as indoor shoes and they fit great on y 16 month old's chubby feet. HE really seems to enjoy wearing them. He also likes the fact that he can take them on and off on his own.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jepma

customer_reviews.title: I love them for regular use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my sons therapy sessions to use with his AFO's and even thoughI bought them 3 sizes big to accommodate his braces, they were unfortunately still too small!!! But nevertheless, I love them for regular use!!!
customer_reviews.author: MzKay

customer_reviews.title: The colors are nice and it looks good.
customer_reviews.text: These are a good set of crocs. My kid loves it and the colors are nice. I got the blue and green one for my 2 year old son. It was his first croc and he loves that he can put it on himself.
customer_reviews.author: Liju Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Crocs - Little Guy Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my 18 month old. He has spent a lot of time out in the yard getting wet & dirting during the hot summer months - I love that they stay on & that they are easy to wash. He gets lots of great comments about the flashy yellow color. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Shipping speed was great! My grand daughter will be pleased with her ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping speed was great! My grand daughter will be pleased with her new crocs. Will fit her in the Spring and Summer next year. Wears a 9 now, so the 10/11 is a little big for now.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: son loves these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. They are a bit wide, but the heel strap makes the shoe stay in place. My son loves these shoes, they are easy for him to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBulldogs

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's shoe size is an 8, going on 9, but the size 8 Crocs are plainly too large for her.
customer_reviews.text: She's too big for a 7, and seems to be going on 9, with all of her other shoes. We were actually disappointed that the available Croc sizes jumped from 8 to 10, because we would have ordered a 9 if possible. Thankfully, we did not. Our consolation is that in several months these size 8 Crocs will fit her, but that's somewhat cold comfort given that we bought them with usage this summer in mind. We suspect that they will not fit until this coming winter.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Merchandise

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Croc for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like being able to slip on a shoe when the kids want to run outside for a bit or you need to run to the store. We ered on the big size so my 3 year old could grow into it. I love these shoes!

customer_reviews.title: great original
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits true to size. Daughter wears 12.5 tennis shoe, bought 12/13. She has average width foot, but flat arch. At first she thought they were too big beings they are a wider looser fit, but after walking in them a little, she now really likes them. She says they are very comfortable. Will buy again. Love that she can throw them on quickly and if they get wet they arent ruined.
customer_reviews.author: shoe lover 13

customer_reviews.title: Just in time!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the "carolina blue" crocs for our son and used standard shipping. It said 5 to 9 business days, but we got them in 3. This worked out much better than expected given our summer vacation schedule. The product is very easy to get on and off, which is critical for little kids. This won't be our last pair of crocs.

customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd pair of Crocs and each time, they have performed wonderfully. They fit nicely and they are easy enough for my 5 year old to get on and off by himself. They are super easy to clean with soapy water, and they dry quickly. The color is different and fun, and my little guy loves that he has "geen soos."
